title: Leather Cloth
description:
3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/16-5/8\" shiny & dull black leather and/or vinyl strips separated by black threads form weft.
Stapled to 11x8.50\" card with 99.1.1012.25 which is slightly different.
\"H-3\", \"Leather Cloth H.W.\" and JLL\'s address card on face. (black)
